Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.math

The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FloatVector
    Generic interface for all float vector implementations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color4
    More specific implementation of a color Float4Vector.
    Float2Matrix
    2x2 float matrix implementation.
    Float2Vector
    A 2-place float vector implementation.
    Float3Matrix
    3x3 float matrix implementation
    Float3Vector
    A 3-place float vector implementation
    Float4Matrix
    4x4 float matrix implementation
    Float4Vector
    A 4-place float vector implementation.
    FloatMatrix
    Abstract class for all Matrices that provides several utility functions.
    FloatMatrixMath
    Utility class for the more abstract Computer Graphics - related Matrix calculations.
    FloatVectorMath
    Utility class for float vector calculations.
    Point4
    A optional, more specific Float4Vector implementation for points.

Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.math Description

The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality. Provides some advanced functionality for Computer Graphics related problems, like perspective matrices and reverse calculation of camera positions.
